title: Should Canada give out ‘immunity passports’ for people who have beaten COVID-19?
description: Experts say it’s worth considering but still too early to say whether people can’t get infected twice or how long immunity lasts.
content: OTTAWA Twelve weeks maybe more Maybe a lot more That is the public estimate for how long Canadians will live with COVID and the slew of restrictions in place to protect against the virus But what if there is a way to loosen those restrictions for s chars
